nodes.text: Sabotage is a short comic story published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.38.

In this issue's all-new Star Wars: The Clone Wars comic adventure, the Separatists attempt to highjack the funeral of the valiant Roonan Halsey. With no transport or comlink, how can Obi-Wan possibly warn everyone in time? There's only one way to find out…
